regen.absent_element: requirement for other drivers to call the lead cab if the call fails to their cab and request reestablishment
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow a driver in any cab, other than the lead cab, to initiate a request to the lead driver for call reestablishment if the call fails to their cab.

regen.absent_element: situation for reestablishing the call when it fails in a non-lead cab
regen.new_specification: The driver in any cab, other than the lead, shall be able to initiate a request to the lead cab to reestablish the call if the call fails in their cab.

regen.absent_element: situation where the call fails to a non-lead cab and the driver must request reestablishment
regen.new_specification: If the call fails to any non-lead cab, the driver in the affected cab shall call the lead cab to request reestablishment of the call.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
